message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $120. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $100 to you. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $95 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $102.50. This is still a great deal for you considering the value you place on the product. Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I would like to stick to my original proposal of $95. I believe this is a fair price given the value I place on the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
